mobs.LongDesc: Magician Bink is here, wishing he weren't.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Bink is a tall, strapping man, with iron grey hair and a neatly trimmed beard
and mustache. He appears to be slightly past his prime, but it is obvious
that he stays in shape. Bink was once banished from Xanth, before his talent
was discovered, so he has learned many of the fine points of swordplay and
rough-housing. And he also has that secret talent to fall back on.

mobs.LongDesc: Chester Centaur is napping here and dreaming of his wife Cherie.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Chester Centaur is a great bull of a man atop a great stallion of a horse.
His hair and flanks have begun to turn grey, but he is still a powerful-
looking specimen of centaurhood. His face is not particularly attractive,
but his hinder portion is sleek and well-formed. He is known to be rather
ornery, so it's not a good idea to wake him.

mobs.LongDesc: Rapunzel, Grundy's wife, dreamily brushes out her long, beuatiful hair here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Rapunzel was kidnapped from a Grimm's Fairy Tale in order to become the wife
of Grundy Golem. She is a beautiful woman, for all that she is no bigger
than your open palm. Her talent is to change the length of her hair, and
currently she prefers it lightly brushing her ankles. She smiles sweetly at
you as she sees you looking at her and gives you a little wink.

mobs.LongDesc: Grundy Golem, the King's Translator, is here chatting with some plants.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Grundy Golem is a tiny little squirt no bigger than your hand. He still has
the surname "Golem", but he became a real creature (real without magic, that
is) some time ago. Grundy was once said to be the only creature in Xanth with
two talents: translation and insult, but his marriage to Rapunzel seems to
have mellowed him...a little.

mobs.LongDesc: Jordan the Barbarian is here, sharpening his sword and humming tunelessly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Jordan is a huge, muscular man of about six and a half feet in height. He is
a true barbarian, with shaggy, unkempt hair and a questionable odor. He looks
VERY formidable, and you do not feel like messing with him now, especially
since he's got his weapon at the ready, and looks like he knows how to use
it to its full advantage.

mobs.LongDesc: Threnody, Jordan's girlfriend, is here strumming a lyre and singing sweetly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Threnody is a tall, very beautiful young woman with long, dark hair and eyes
of witching green. She has an air of mystery and seduction about her, perhaps
due to her half-demon heritage. She is quite an accomplished singer, though,
and accompanies herself well on the lyre. Jordan loves her to distraction,
so you'd better not try anything funny if he's around.

mobs.LongDesc: Millie, aka the Ghost, aka the Maid, aka the Zombie Master's wife, is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Millie is a petite woman of early middle age, very attractive to look at,
with honey-blonde hair that has not yet faded with age, and bright blue eyes
that hold a no-nonsense demeanor. You notice that the male members of your
party become very hot and uncomfortable as they look upon her, and the
females seem to radiate waves of solid hate. Millie's talent is sex appeal,
and she has used it to catch herself a powerful Magician as a husband.

mobs.LongDesc: Magician Jonathan, better known as the Zombie Master, sits here silently.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Zombie Master is a tall, thin, gaunt man with dark hair and eyes, who
looks a bit more like his creations than polite people like to admit. He is
reknowned for his humorless demeanor and lack of social skills, but his
marriage to Millie the Maid has made him better-fleshed and better-tempered.
Still, he is not one for idle chatter, and he would prefer you to leave him
alone with his wife, as in immediately.

mobs.LongDesc: The Sorceress Iris, Queen Emeritus and wife of Trent, raises an eyebrow at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Queen Emeritus Iris is an older woman, with hair going to grey and a body
losing its struggle against advancing age, but as she is able to use her
talent of illusion to change her appearance to anything she likes, you
cannot be completely certain that this is her true form. She is a tough,
smart lady who will do anything for her husband Trent, whom she loves.
She is not known for her scruples, either, so "anything" is quite a lot.

mobs.LongDesc: Magician Trent, Transformer-King Emeritus, nods at you and continues reading.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
King Emeritus Trent is an older man, but still sturdy, with iron grey hair
and knowing eyes. He is one of the most powerful Magicians in Xanth, and he
ruled it wisely and well for many years before handing over the reins to his
son-in-law Dor. He is still a powerful influence in the court, and a very
well-respected elder statesman. He is worthy of great respect.

mobs.LongDesc: The pudgy, balding old man known as Magician Murphy is reading in here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Magician Murphy was one of Xanth's most powerful Magicians a few hundred years
ago, until he was exiled from Xanth into the storage of the Brain Coral and
then to Mundania for his designs against then-King Roogna. His exile in that
barren land convinced him to turn over a new leaf, and he know holds a place
of honor in his home kingdom, frequently advising the present King. Murphy's
talent is to make things go wrong, which is dangerous and unpredictable, but
better to have as an ally than an enemy.

mobs.LongDesc: Vadne, Sorceress of Topology and wife of Murphy, is here writing in a diary.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Sorceress Vadne was once a beautiful woman, and is still rather striking
for her age, but her long exile in drear Mundania has left her looking a bit
tired and worn. Her dark hair is beginning to surrender to grey, and her face
is beginning to become careworn. Her glance is as steely as ever, though, and
she fixes her bright green eyes on you suspiciously as she sees you looking
at her. Apparently she has not forgotten anything she learned in Xanth.

mobs.LongDesc: Xavier, a yellow-haired bronze god of a man, is wishing he could go flying here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Xavier is an absolutely gorgeous-looking man, with yellow-blond hair, skin
tanned to the color of old bronze, and a muscular build that shows he is not
afraid to get into a tussle. Xavier's talent is "zapping", which he has never
explained to people, only demonstrated. It doesn't sound good, though. Xavier
is married to Zora, who is in fact a zombie, though she doesn't look it.

mobs.LongDesc: Zora Zombie, wife of Xavier, gazes fondly upon her husband here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Zora Zombie is a very attractive young lady who nevertheless is dead. She
killed herself after her true love was false to her, and was later returned
to half-life by the Zombie Master. She existed in this state for hundreds of
years before encountering Xavier while he was travelling with Queen Irene,
and fell in love with him through a mischance with a love spring. Xavier
was at first repelled by her, but later grew to love her back for her sweet
and selfless nature. The resultant attention has been good for her, and she
is much more attractive than others of her type. She loves Xavier dearly.

mobs.LongDesc: Chem Centaur, Official Royal Mapmaker for the Land of Xanth, is here working.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Chem is a cute, button-nosed young woman from the waist up, and a striking
young mare from below the waist. She has long, flowing brown hair, eyes of
a dark chocolate color, and two rather large breasts, which are left exposed
to the eyes of all in the centaur tradition. Chem is a nice girl, and very
intelligent, but has had problems with her people both because of her magic
talent, which is making illusory maps, and because of her indiscretion with
Xap, Xavier's hippogriff friend. Chem is a strong-willed young lady, though,
and she does not let the prejudice of others get her down.

mobs.LongDesc: Chet Centaur, friend to King Dor, is here doing some complex calculations.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Chet Centaur is not very large in centaur terms, but he stands two full heads
taller than any human you have ever seen. He is not bad-looking, with curly
brown hair and chocolate brown eyes like his sister Chem, but he has never
seemed particularly interested in finding a mate. He is a wizard at math,
though, and thus spends most of his day in here, shuffling through papers
and doing whatever accounting is necessary for the crown.

mobs.LongDesc: King Dor sits here on his throne, worrying about his kingdom.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The King of Xanth does not look particularly impressive, truth be told. He
looks like a typical young man who worries too much and has a bit too much
responsibility. His hair is brown, and his eyes are blue, and his face is
twisted into a frown of concentration. He appears lost in thought, and doesn't
seem to notice your presence, but you remember that Xanth's Kings are chosen
for the strength of their magic, so it would probably not be a good idea to
molest him, especially since there are plenty of guards around.

mobs.LongDesc: Smash Ogre is here, squeezing handfuls of sand into sandstone for fun.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Smash is a big ugly brute of an ogre, like all ogres, but he somehow looks
a little less stupid and brutish than others of his kind. This is because
he also has human heritage, and thus is a bit less ugly and more intelligent
than other ogres. Smash is a VERY strong guy, but he is kind and loyal too,
so he has a lot of friends around Castle Roogna, and is often called to help
them out of jams that require an ogre's brute strength.

mobs.LongDesc: Tandy Nymph, daughter of Jewel Nymph, and wife of Smash, is writing her mother.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Tandy is a cute, button-nosed girl with brown hair and blue eyes. She is
part nymph, so is sometimes kind of airheaded and flighty, but her human
heritage allows her a little more stability. Her talent is throwing tantrums,
which can stun a human target, or even an ogre, for quite awhile. Other than
that, though, she is fairly defenseless, and relies on her husband Smash to
protect her, which he is very good at.

mobs.LongDesc: Prince Dolph, Magician and shapechanger, smiles at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dolph is a cute young boy of about six or seven years of age, with brown
hair like his father and green eyes like his mother. Dolph's talent is to
change into whatever sort of creature he can imagine, which makes him a
full Magician despite being just a boy. One day he will by King of Xanth,
if his sister Ivy doesn't want it. Right now, though, he is just a cute
little moppet with a friendly smile, and you get the urge to pick him up
and hug him as you smile back.

mobs.LongDesc: Princess Ivy smiles at you from the back of her dragon friend, Stanley.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Princess Ivy is an attractive girl who is headed at breakneck speed towards
womanhood. She has long, flowing blonde hair with just a hint of green to
it, like her mother's, and witching green eyes. Her talent is Enhancement,
that is, making whatever she focuses on more like she sees it than it is.
She is a full Sorceress, and one day will be King of Xanth, if she chooses.
Right now she appears to be looking for a husband, though, so who can tell
what her plans for the future are...

mobs.LongDesc: Irene, Queen of Xanth, is watering her plants and humming to herself here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Queen Irene is a very attractive woman of perhaps 30 years of age. She has
flowing blonde hair with green highlights, and bright green eyes. She favors
green in clothing and decoration, too, as you can see from her jewelry and
clothing. Her talent is to make plants grow at a phenomenal rate, whether
from seed or an already mature plant. This talent is very powerful in Xanth,
where the plants are much more dangerous than in Mundania. Irene is a tough,
no-nonsense sort of woman, who takes no guff from anyone.

mobs.LongDesc: One of the guards of Castle Roogna is here, maintaining order.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Castle Roogna does not ordinarily come under siege, but the few times it has
have convinced the Kings of Xanth to maintain a small honor guard for the
castle and its inhabitants. These are generally volunteers, young men from
local villages who are trained in combat and feel like moving away from the
old homestead. This guard looks fairly typical: strong, sturdy, and not
overly bright. But at least he's friendly enough.

mobs.LongDesc: A busy little woman shoves you aside and adds some seasoning to a boiling pot.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This woman must be the Head Cook of Castle Roogna, for she is constantly
keeping an eye on everything that is happening in the kitchen. Not a pot may
have water boiled in it that she has not inspected to make sure the water is
boiled ABSOLUTELY RIGHT. She looks to be about 40 years old, and is rather
dumpy-looking, but she takes her job seriously, which is good in a cook.

mobs.LongDesc: Chameleon is here, looking as ugly and smart as possible, and nagging Bink.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the ugliest woman you have seen in a long time. You wonder how Bink can
stand to be with someone like this. And on top of that, she nags him and is
generally in a bad mood all the time. As you watch you begin to understand.
There is a keen intelligence behind that face and watching even now, you can
see her slowly changing in her monthly cycle from ugly and intelligent to
beautiful and dumb. A new woman all the time, no wonder Bink loves her so
much. ..Yet you don't envy his place as she threatens him with a wooden spoon.

mobs.LongDesc: One of the cooks of Castle Roogna is hard at work making something tasty here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The cooks of Castle Roogna are a quiet, hard-working lot who take a lot of
pride in their work. This one pays you no mind, being hard at work, and much
too busy to talk to visitors with the next meal only 8 hours away.

mobs.LongDesc: A young lad is washing some dishes here in preparation for the next meal.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This dishwasher, like dishwashers everywhere, seems to be a young lout whose
parents made him work at the castle to keep him out of trouble. His hair is
a bit longer than is fashionable elsewhere, and he looks as if he desperately
needs a cigarette. You feel a little sorry for him.

mobs.LongDesc: A servant of the castle is busying herself with her duties here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Castle Roogna has a lot of servants, mostly because the people need to do
something to make themselves feel useful, since most of the basic staples
of life are free for the asking all over Xanth. This servant is a fetching
young woman in her late teens, who probably dreams of meeting someone famous
completely by surprise who will love her madly and take her far away from all
this, when all she ever expected was the simple life of a servant.

mobs.LongDesc: A servant of the castle is going about his duties here, ignoring you completely.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The servants of Castle Roogna are an industrious lot, but not overly pompous
or self-important. The glance that this man gives you as he rushes by you
without saying a word seems to say that ordinarily he would LOVE to sit and
talk with you for hours on end, but alas, he is running a VERY INPORTANT
errand for the King, so he can't.

mobs.LongDesc: The yellow hippogriff known as Xap, friend and steed of Xavier, rests here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Hippogriffs are similar to griffons, except that they have the bodies of
horses rather than lions. The front two legs are actually eagle talons,
whereas the rear legs are equine, but hippogriffs are fast runners. Xap
is a handsome specimen of a hippogriff, with a tawny yellow horse's body,
and pale yellow feathers the color of sunshine. Xap is a fine flier, and
a fine fighter, but ordinarily not aggressive. You should have nothing to
fear from him...unless of course you provoke him...

mobs.LongDesc: Crombie the Soldier, Captain of the King's Guard, is here supervising things.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Crombie is a sturdy man in his late-middle years, with iron-grey hair and a
thick, bushy moustache. He obviously keeps himself fit, for his body is still
lean and muscular, though he is slightly past his prime. He stands straight
and tall, and you can tell that he is perfectly suited for the position of
Captain of the Guard, for he glares at you suspiciously.

mobs.LongDesc: The Named Dread Irving cowers in the corner, avoiding you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Why, it doesn't look frightening at all. In fact, it seems petrified of you,
now that you have deprived it of its power. It will offer no resistance.

mobs.LongDesc: Grace'l Ossein is here, looking for her husband Marrow.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Grace'l is quite shapely, for a skeleton. If she had flesh over those bones,
she might be quite a looker. However, her husband Marrow likes her just the
way she is, flesh being most unattractive and messy. Oh well, you shrug, to
each his (or her) own.

mobs.LongDesc: Marrow Bones is here, lurking around out of habit.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Marrow is a human skeleton, about six feet high. Despite his lack of flesh,
his features have a lot of character, and you can tell that he is basically
an OK sort of person. A little stiff, perhaps, but nice. He appears genuinely
interested in you, but not threatening.

mobs.LongDesc: A wizened little man moves around this area, making tsk-tsk noises.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is very old, and very fidgety. He is constantly moving from pile to
pile, rearranging their contents to his satisfaction. He appears to be the
anal retentive type of person who can do this sort of thing all day and go
home satisfied as to his life's work. Oh well, takes all kinds.

mobs.LongDesc: A little elf is clambering over the piles of books, trying to catalog them.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This little guy is panting quite desperately and sweating profusely as he'
struggles to the top of the pile of books, selects a volume that weighs
nearly as much as he does, then slip-slides back down the pile to put it
away. He doesn't look like he needs distractions right now.

mobs.LongDesc: One of the Good Magician's servants bustles his way through here busily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Good Magician must be quite a taskmaster, because this guy looks as if
his very life depends upon his mission, whatever that might be. He just
plain ignores you as he gets on with his work. Sheesh!

mobs.LongDesc: A small alley cat stares back at you, imitating your every action.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is a normal-looking alley cat, with fur, claws, and a long tail of
which it appears quite proud. Its behavior, however, is something else
again. The stupid beast is imitating your every action, and you are
getting a little tired of being mocked...

mobs.LongDesc: A huge eagle-like bird caws angrily at your entrance, deafening you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This must be the fabled roc, an absolutely monstruous bird, far larger than
any dragon. Its tremendous talons could easily crush you to pulp, with no
more effort than you would take to swat a fly. The roc doesn't look very
pleased to see you here, so the prudent course might be to exit, fast...

mobs.LongDesc: An elf is here, rapidly disappearing under a huge coil of rope.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is is struggling elffully with the coil of rope, occassionally tripping
and falling as he overbalances himself, but gamely getting up and going back
to work. The whole effect is more than a little funny, and you stifle a
chuckle as you listen to him mutter under his breath.

mobs.LongDesc: There is a cat with a striped green and brown coat sitting here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You look closer at the cat and notice that its "fur" is actually
composed of needles instead of fur.  The ears are actually thorns
that are large and stiff.  The claws of the cat area actually sharpened
slicing blades of bone.  It blinks as you look at it.

mobs.LongDesc: A creature with the heads of a lion, a goat, and a dragon lurks here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The chimera is an ancient heraldic beast, very dangerous. It has three heads,
a lion's head, a goat's heat, and a dragon's head. Its claws are also very
dangerous, and the dragon's head can breathe fire. You are in for a tough
fight, if you decide to stick around long enough.

mobs.LongDesc: There is a ram here trying to batter it way through a wall.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This sheep has small, curly horns and a curly pelt.  It seems to
enjoy running into any obstacle in its path trying to crash through
it.

mobs.LongDesc: A carnivorous rabbit slowly bares its three-inch fangs and hisses at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This bunny looks innocent enough from a few feet away, but as you get closer,
you notice that it has huge fangs, and is slavering at you hungrily. It must
be a fabled carnivorous rabiit, very deadly to the incautious.

mobs.LongDesc: A small flying dragon puffs fire from its nostrils and swoops down on you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This dragon is made for strafing runs, all of its muscle goes to either the
wings or the chest. Speed and firepower are its specialties, as you are just
about to discover...

mobs.LongDesc: A huge and very angry demon materializes and attacks!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This demon is easily twelves feet tall, with horns, fangs, hooves, and
bright red skin. Its eyes glow with a malevolent intelligence, and it
grins soullessly at you as it prepares to rip you to bloody shreds.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge and incredibly ugly ogre glowers at you stupidly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Ogres from Xanth are about 12 feet tall and immensely strong. Their strength
is directly proportional to their ugliness, and inversely proportional to
their intelligence. This one looks VERY ugly and VERY stupid, so you'd
better watch out...

mobs.LongDesc: A servant of the Good Magician goes about her business here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This appears to be nothing more than one of the ordinary womenfolk of Xanth,
probably working off her year of service in exchange for her answer. She
pays you no mind as she continues working.

mobs.LongDesc: A zombie is here, ready to defend its Master.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This zombie is horribly decayed, and it is no longer possible to tell what
kind of creature it was in life. Its eyes glow with a terrible light, and
it is unrelenting in its defense of its Master, the Magician Jonathan.

mobs.LongDesc: There is a cat with a striped green and brown coat sitting here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You look closer at the cat and notice that its "fur" is actually
composed of needles instead of fur.  The ears are actually thorns
that are large and stiff.  The claws of the cat area actually sharpened
slicing blades of bone.  It blinks as you look at it.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge eagle-like bird caws angrily at your entrance, deafening you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This must be the fabled roc, an absolutely monstruous bird, far larger than
any dragon. Its tremendous talons could easily crush you to pulp, with no
more effort than you would take to swat a fly. The roc doesn't look very
pleased to see you here, so the prudent course might be to exit, fast...

mobs.LongDesc: A huge eagle-like bird caws angrily at your entrance, deafening you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This must be the fabled roc, an absolutely monstruous bird, far larger than
any dragon. Its tremendous talons could easily crush you to pulp, with no
more effort than you would take to swat a fly. The roc doesn't look very
pleased to see you here, so the prudent course might be to exit, fast...

mobs.LongDesc: A huge and incredibly ugly ogre glowers at you stupidly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Ogres from Xanth are about 12 feet tall and immensely strong. Their strength
is directly proportional to their ugliness, and inversely proportional to
their intelligence. This one looks VERY ugly and VERY stupid, so you'd
better watch out...

mobs.LongDesc: A little elf is helping the copy cat make copies for Humfrey.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This little elf is copying page after page of material for humfrey, sliding
the paper under the copy cat's tail and waiting as it whirs and purrs, then
takes the copy from it's mouth.  He seems to be working very hard.
